body_html:
The differences between this pull request and previous #16185

  • change FullPivLU to PartialPivLU
  • change full matrix of permutation to an index array.
  • use tf.gather instead of p^-1 lu
  • Ops derived from OpKernel, instead of LinearAlgebraOp
  • An integer INFO is returned with L, U, P. INFO is the index of the first zero diagonal in U, like INFO argument in LAPACK function xGETRF.
body_text:
The differences between this pull request and previous #16185

change FullPivLU to PartialPivLU
change full matrix of permutation to an index array.
use tf.gather instead of p^-1 lu
Ops derived from OpKernel, instead of LinearAlgebraOp
An integer INFO is returned with L, U, P. INFO is the index of the first zero diagonal in U, like INFO argument in LAPACK function xGETRF.
body:
The differences between this pull request and previous https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16185
- change FullPivLU to PartialPivLU
- change full matrix of permutation to an index array.
- use tf.gather instead of p^-1 lu
- Ops derived from OpKernel, instead of LinearAlgebraOp 
- An integer INFO is returned with L, U, P. INFO is the index of the first zero diagonal in U, like INFO argument in LAPACK function xGETRF.
